text: The following lists events that happened in 1983 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Vigdís Finnbogadóttir *Prime Minister - Gunnar Thoroddsen, Steingrímur Hermannsson ==Events== ==Births== Hera Hjartardóttir Garðar Gunnlaugsson *1 April - Hera Hjartardóttir, singer-songwriter *1 April - Ólafur Ingi Skúlason, footballer. *7 September - Garðar Gunnlaugsson, footballer ==Deaths== *19 June - Vilmundur Gylfason, politician, historian and poet (b. 1948) *8 February - Sigurður Þórarinsson, geologist (b. 1912) *25 September - Gunnar Thoroddsen, politician (b. 1910) ==References== Category:1980s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1983 in Iceland
